analysis_results: Trending topics: product quality, customer service

Return Data.report_title: Q3 2024 Sentiment Analysis Executive Summary Report
Return Data.executive_summary: Customer sentiment analysis for Q3 2024 reveals a mixed but generally positive outlook with 45% positive sentiment and an overall score of 6.2/10. Key areas of concern include complaint rates at 25%, primarily focused on product quality and customer service issues requiring immediate attention.
recommendations: Monitor sentiment trends weekly instead of quarterly
Address top complaint categories within 30 days
report_sections: Executive Overview - High-level sentiment distribution and trends
Key Performance Indicators - Critical metrics and benchmarks
Sentiment Breakdown Analysis - Detailed positive/negative/neutral analysis
Visual Charts Section - Graphical representation of sentiment data
Strategic Recommendations - Actionable next steps for management
